issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi, 
This is a new feature requested to enable hyperloop on an existing project from the CLI.
We have to enable every other module by hand too if you are using CLI. The studio does it for us.  

Now we can enable  Hyperloop on an existing project /old project with studio by adding  <module>hyperloop</module> and <plugin>hyperloop</plugin> to our tiapp.xml
But it is not possible to enable  Hyperloop on an existing project /old project with CLI. It will be great if  we can enable  Hyperloop on an existing project with CLI 

Thanks
fields.summary: Enable hyperloop on an existing project from the CLI

comments.body: Resolving as {{Invalid}} as newer versions of Hyperloop can be enabled even without the CLI as it's not tied to the appc-services anymore.
Closing as invalid. If incorrect, please reopen.
